item.description:
Join Us for a Special Seminar on Spiritual Meditation

Saturday, June 12 at 7:30 pm

If your mind is taking you where you don't want to go, it's time to train it. Real spiritual meditation isn't about relaxation, it's about connecting to God within. Learn how, and experience what life is like
with a clear, peaceful mind. Get still, get connected. Join us for this seminar that will change your life.

The Center of Light
85 Edgell Road
Framingham, MA 01701

(on the Framingham Common)

Park in the driveway on the right side. Use the side door on the left to enter.

Suggested Donation: $25; Bring a Friend for Free!

For more details and to register please contact Rev Marie Francis at 617.990.7411 or Boston@CentersOfLight.org
item.name: Seminar: Spiritual Meditation
